content:
# The Stone Furnace has been successfully placed, but it is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt. 
# I need to add some coal to the furnace to start the smelting process.

# 1. Insert coal into the Stone Furnace to fuel it.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_position, quantity=5)

# 2. After inserting coal, let's check the status of the furnace to ensure it's operational.
furnace_status = inspect_inventory(furnace_position)
print(f"Furnace inventory: {furnace_status}")
